alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 2:14PM MST until January 05 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow followed by light freezing rain is expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
